description.displayText:
Abi has been our full-time nanny since June 2021. We consider her to be a "once in a lifetime" opportunity, as she is absolutely amazing. She is professional, punctual, dependable, kind, calm and easy going. She has done a wonderful job taking care of our two young energetic kids. She has been able to balance taking them on adventures (to the parks/beaches/etc) along with making sure they have time at home to rest and play. She is very patient with them and they have been able to grow and learn a lot from her.
Outside of taking care of our children, Abi has also stepped into the role of household manager. She helps with our meal planning, grocery shopping and meal prep. She is a great cook and makes healthy plant based meals with a wide variety of foods. She helps with organization of the house and also with keeping the house clean and tidy. She also helps with running errands if they come up during days that she is work. We would highly recommend Abi to any family!

description.displayText: My family is so thankful to have Abi caring for our son. Abi is attentive, caring, thoughtful, and extremely helpful. Not only is Abi amazing but our son loves her. It's wonderful to see him light up when she cares for him. Abi emphasizes learning and fun on a daily basis, taking him on fun little adventures that encourages his growth. Abi truly is an exceptional caregiver.
description.originalText: My family is so thankful to have Abi caring for our son. Abi is attentive, caring, thoughtful, and extremely helpful. Not only is Abi amazing but our son loves her. It's wonderful to see him light up when she cares for him. Abi emphasizes learning and fun on a daily basis, taking him on fun little adventures that encourages his growth. Abi truly is an exceptional caregiver.

description.displayText: Very reliable, responsible, caring and fun babysitter for our ~1 year old daughter. More than capable of taking care of several kids at a time. She'll often tidy up when she has the chance. We love her!
description.originalText: Very reliable, responsible, caring and fun babysitter for our ~1 year old daughter. More than capable of taking care of several kids at a time. She'll often tidy up when she has the chance. We love her!

description.displayText: Abi is such an amazing nanny for our 2 and 4 year old boys. She cooks and cleans, but most importantly engages with our kids the entire time she is with them.
description.originalText: Abi is such an amazing nanny for our 2 and 4 year old boys. She cooks and cleans, but most importantly engages with our kids the entire time she is with them.

description.displayText: Abi has been nothing short of amazing with our toddler.  Our 20 month old loves and trusts Abi and has gotten so much out of their time together.  Abi somehow magically juggles multiple toddlers (we nanny share some days), and  keeps them (all under 2 yrs) happy and quietly playing together for hours. She takes the kids outside, plays and reads to them, and successfully got them to nap, keeping them on their schedules.  She's been so flexible, helpful and low-maintenance, tidying up the house at the end of each day and giving us, and our neighbors with whom we do nanny-share, such as sense of ease and comfort knowing that our kiddos are safe, engaged and happy with Ms. Abi. I can't recommend Abi for child and home related care more highly. She's a uniquely capable, sensitive, creative, experienced, energetic young person, who we  trust and appreciate.  Her rates are very reasonable for the quality of care, dependability and flexibility she affords us.

description.displayText: Abi has assisted us in last minute situations and planned.  Our Son loves his time with Abi and recapping in the evening how much fun he had with her.  She is very thoughtful from the personalized thank you note to our son, to unexpectedly completing dishes for us.  Abi is great and I would recommend her to anyone :)

description.displayText: Abi has been amazing with our 16 month old son and his 18 month old friend for our nanny-share. I was so nervous to leave him, but Abi has a great temperament that puts us all at ease. So grateful that we met and hired Abi!
description.originalText: Abi has been amazing with our 16 month old son and his 18 month old friend for our nanny-share. I was so nervous to leave him, but Abi has a great temperament that puts us all at ease. So grateful that we met and hired Abi!

description.displayText: Abi has been great with our two girls this summer! Abi is very active and has engaged the girls in lots of outdoor activities! The girls enjoy spending time with her and they were very comfortable with her from the beginning. She has been reliable, responsible and has been a great resource for us!
